name: Jonathan Wolverton
body:
### _I make things that do things._

I got into the tech scene because I love it.  I was a hobbyist for a few years, where I built up familiarity with Windows and Linux operating systems along with Python, HTML, CSS, and Ruby.  Then I came to @appacademy where I added Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, Backbone.js, and a host of other web technologies.

### Mad Skills
* Linux
* Ruby
* Rails
* JavaScript
* jQuery
* Backbone.js
* SQL
* HTML5 & CSS3
* Git

### Recent Projects

##### Inquisit

An imitation of Quora.com. I built this from the ground up with PostgreSQL, Ruby on Rails, Backbone.js, Twitter Bootstrap, and Devise.

**[Try it Live](http://inquisit.herokuapp.com/users/sign_in) • [View it on Github](https://github.com/wolverdude/Inquisit)**

##### Asteroids

My version of the classic arcade game. I built it with object-oriented JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas.

**[Try it Live](http://wolverdude.github.io/asteroids) • [View it on Github](https://github.com/wolverdude/asteroids)**

### More About Me

* I love hacking, hiking, and hanging out with people.  
* I'm a lightning-quick learner, and I prefer to dive into things head-first.
* I am obsessed with keeping my code clean, dry, and readable.
* I've recently taken on skateboarding -- no broken bones yet!
* I over-think things... all the time.
* I love solving problems!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
